professional experience.project__description: While managing the sheet music department of a family-owned music store, I maintained the WordPress website, taught myself PHP, and built the following tools to automate and simplify daily tasks:

A tool for collaborative event organization, moving the workflow from a number of shared Excel sheets to a centralized app, reducing errors, lost data, and miscommunications.
